price: (10) And they will say, "If only we had been listening or reasoning, we would not be among the companions of the Blaze."
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ كُنَّا نَسۡمَعُ أَوۡ نَعۡقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqālū law kunnā nasmaʿu aw naʿqilu mā kunnā fī aṣḥābi al-saʿīri
